publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6930 Mary Mulligan: Congratulations to PSYBT West Lothian Business Awards Winners 2010—That the Parliament congratulates Michael Smith on winning the Prince’s Scottish Youth Business Trust Business Awards West Lothian Final 2010 for his personal training and sports massage therapy business, Personal Best: Health Fitness and Wellbeing, based in Bathgate; notes that, in addition to developing his business, Michael has also helped prepare the Scottish Women’s Rugby squad for its Six Nations tournament, was the official massage therapist for Basketball Scotland and accompanied the Scottish Junior Ladies Team to the European Championships in Romania, and also commends Rebecca Kelly who was runner up with her hair and beauty salon, RK Hair Studio in Bathgate, and the three other finalists, Lindsay McGeechan of Beauty Boutique in Bathgate, Damian and Joseph Duffin of Experience Exercise in Bathgate and Jonathan Sneddon of Valet Master (Scotland) based in Mid Calder, all of whom were awarded Business Excellence Awards.

S3M-6930 Congratulations to PSYBT West Lothian Business Awards Winners 2010 (lodged on 7 September 2010) Cathy Jamieson*, Robin Harper*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Jackie Baillie*, Rhona Brankin*, Pauline McNeill*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Helen Eadie*
S3M-6930 Congratulations to PSYBT West Lothian Business Awards Winners 2010 (lodged on 7 September 2010) Cathy Peattie*, Hugh Henry*
